mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_service_package ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, type, service_id, num) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{type}, #{serviceId}, #{num});
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS GmtCreate, type, service_id AS serviceId, num FROM b_service_package WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
SELECT a.id, a.gmt_create AS GmtCreate, a.type, a.service_id AS serviceId, a.num, b.code FROM b_service b LEFT JOIN b_service_package a ON b.id = a.service_id WHERE a.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT a.id, a.gmt_create AS GmtCreate, a.type, a.service_id AS serviceId, a.num, b.`name`, b.code FROM b_service b LEFT JOIN b_service_package a ON b.id = a.service_id WHERE a.type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.is_delete = 0 AND b.code != '190'

SELECT b.id, b.type, b.num, a.`name` AS serviceName, a.id AS serviceId, a.`code` AS serviceCode FROM b_service_package b LEFT JOIN b_service a ON b.service_id = a.id WHERE b.id = #{servicePackageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
